name: Blacklane GmbH
goal: Blacklane is the global chauffeur and airport concierge service. We bring peace of mind to the most stressful part of travel: between the front door and airplane gate. Chauffeurs and airport concierges ensure guest safety, efficiency, and comfort across more than 600 airports, 300 cities, and 60 countries. Travellers can book Blacklane services at all-inclusive rates on our website or mobile apps or via distribution and channel partners.
euInitiatives: Digital single market for transportation. Ride-hailing, taxi and similar transportation frameworks.
